# State of Clarity - Brand Assets

Official logo variants and brand assets for State of Clarity.

## Logo Variants

| File | Use Case | Size |
|------|----------|------|
| `logo-icon.svg` | App icon, favicon, social avatars | 64x64 |
| `logo-icon-light.svg` | Icon on light backgrounds (no bg fill) | 64x64 |
| `logo-horizontal.svg` | Header, email headers, documents | 280x48 |
| `logo-horizontal-white.svg` | Dark backgrounds, video overlays | 280x48 |
| `logo-vertical.svg` | Social posts, splash screens | 140x120 |
| `logo-wordmark.svg` | Text-only contexts | 200x32 |
| `logo-wordmark-white.svg` | Text-only on dark backgrounds | 200x32 |
| `favicon.svg` | Browser tabs (simplified) | 32x32 |

## Design Concept

The logo uses the **Sparkles icon** (from Lucide) to represent **insight and clarity**:
- **Sparkles**: Moments of insight, clarity emerging from complexity
- **Deep Sage background**: Calm, trustworthy, evidence-based
- **Rounded square**: Modern, approachable, accessible

## Brand Colors

| Color | Hex | Usage |
|-------|-----|-------|
| Deep Sage | `#5E6F64` | Primary brand, icon backgrounds |
| Warm Ivory | `#F7F4EF` | Icon elements, light text |
| Soft Ink | `#1F2328` | Dark text, wordmarks |

## Usage Guidelines

### Minimum Sizes
- Icon: 24px minimum
- Horizontal logo: 140px minimum width
- Favicon: 16px minimum

### Clear Space
Maintain padding equal to the height of the icon on all sides.

### Don'ts
- Don't rotate or skew the logo
- Don't change the colors
- Don't add effects (shadows, gradients not in original)
- Don't place on busy backgrounds without adequate contrast

## Base64 Encoded (for emails)

### Icon (40x40) - Sparkles Logo
```
data:image/svg+xml;base64,
```

## File Locations

```
public/brand/
├── README.md           # This file
├── logo-icon.svg       # Primary icon (sage bg)
├── logo-icon-light.svg # Icon without background
├── logo-horizontal.svg # Icon + wordmark (default)
├── logo-horizontal-white.svg
├── logo-vertical.svg   # Stacked layout
├── logo-wordmark.svg   # Text only
├── logo-wordmark-white.svg
└── favicon.svg         # Simplified for small sizes
```
